Title: Total Recall
Plot: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he... Read all
Tagline: They stole his mind, now he wants it back.
Writers: Philip K. Dick, Ronald Shusett, Dan O'Bannon
Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside
